content:
User: Grok 3, is there a way I can prompt you to return more dense results that aren't as lengthy, similar to the format in the first 2 documents with additional clarification with longer explanations only as required by something like an ethical dilemma? Part of what you'll need to be assisting with is parsing transcripts. I've worked on this with you before as indicated in the link to a transcript below from a previous interaction with you and Grok Think:

Grok: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WKOUjkKCUUBQv7u3hlwPvTLdyTIcf1fm/view?usp=sharing
